Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it would be an excellent fit for you. Given its unique features and benefits, we are offering this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $15000. This price reflects not only the high quality and value of the product but also our commitment to providing unparalleled customer service. We are confident that you will find immense value in our product, enhancing your experience and contributing positively to your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and make this product part of your success story. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
